Title: Relates to automatic license plate readers
Summary: Relates to automatic license plate readers (ALPRs); sets out when the use of ALPR systems is allowable; the preservation of any plate data obtained; how to obtain disclosure of such data through a court order; mandatory postings of policies and annual reporting requirements; how the data may be used in proceedings, criminal and civil; and places such data in the personal data category.
LawCode: Add ยง397-b, Gen Bus L; add ยง837-t, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law and the executive law, in relation to the use of automatic license plate reader systems
